Id3Lib (MSVC)

Download

  • Download http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/id3lib/id3lib-3.8.3.zip

Bug correction

  • In %SOURCE_HOME%/include/id3/utils.h, modify:
    #include <config.h>
    --> 
    #include <id3/config.h>

Adaptation

  • Rename config.h.win32 in config.h, copy it in /include/id3/

Project

  • Open %SOURCE_HOME%/libprj/id3lib.sln

Project Options

  • C/C++, Code Generation, Runtime library : Multi-threaded

Compile

  • Build Release

Install

  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/id3/ to Shared/Include/id3/
  • Copy libid3.lib to Shared/Library/MSVC/Id3Lib.lib
  • Don't use zlib.lib (too old)
